'''House Towers''' is an extinct noble house of [[the Riverlands]]. Their sigil was five black towers on white, surrounded by a double tressure red and black.

Their seat was the castle of [[Harrenhal]], which was granted to them after the extinction of [[House Qoherys]]. However, the Towers also died out, and the castle was passed on to [[House Harroway]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Towers' backstory is the same.
